thread.title: Warriors' JaVale McGee celebrates playoff berth by…becoming a sideline reporter
thread.title_full: Warriors' JaVale McGee celebrates playoff berth by…becoming a sideline reporter

author: Joe Rivera (Joseph.Rivera@performgroup.com)
title: Warriors' JaVale McGee celebrates playoff berth by…becoming a sideline reporter
text:
— FanSportsClips (@FanSportsClips) February 26, 2017 
Rosalyn pulls off the braid better, just for the record, JaVale. 
Anyway, after watching this, it's hard to see why Shaq and McGee don't get along. Maybe McGee can interview Shaq and try and clear the air? 
But on a grander scale, McGee won't be able to practice his reporting skills any time soon, with Golden State poised to make another deep run in the NBA playoffs this season. Watch This
